title: I still don't know if its fiction or not.
review: I can't walk from my house to my car with out looking into the woods and getting shivers. If you like to hike or live in the woods I don't recommend this movie to you, you'll never be the same. With the integration of there web site (www.blairwitch.com) to the Oscar caliber performing, this is defiantly an all-time great.
